## Type

<!-- Check one: -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] Feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Refactor (non-breaking change that restructures code)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing behavior to change)
- [ ] Documentation / tests only

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project's style and conventions
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`python -m pytest tests/`)
- [ ] New tests added for changed behavior
- [ ] Docstrings updated for public API changes
- [ ] No new security concerns introduced (see SECURITY.md)
- [ ] Manifest signing/verification unchanged or explicitly reviewed
